wikipedia_page.main: Robert William Dixon-Smith, Baron Dixon-Smith DL (born 30 September 1934), is a British farmer and Conservative Party politician. Lord Dixon-Smith is a former Shadow Minister at the Department for Communities and Local Government.

response: * Robert Dixon-Smith, Baron Dixon-Smith (born 1934), British peer and Conservative politician
